text:
irt-Hogg-Dub syndrome ?,Birt-Hogg-Dub syndrome is rare; its exact incidence is unknown. This condition has been reported in more than 400 families.,GHR,Birt-Hogg-Dub syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Birt-Hogg-Dub syndrome ?,"Mutations in the FLCN gene cause Birt-Hogg-Dub syndrome. This gene provides instructions for making a protein called folliculin. The normal function of this protein is unknown, but researchers believe that it may act as a tumor suppressor. Tumor suppressors p
